participant_1.background:
I have enough money for my needs and wants.
my hobbies include reading and cycling.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
My most interesting experience was meeting one of my favorite celebrities and getting his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire.
I'm looking forward to starting my career and making a difference in the world.

participant_2.background:
I'd rather not talk about my parents, but I'm happy to answer any other questions.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
i cannot stand clutter or dust.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
I sing nursery rhymes for my son on weekends because he loves them.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you!
I'm glad to hear that! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, cycle, and play video games.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read and cycle too.
That's great! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I really enjoy historical fiction and fantasy.
I'm not much of a reader, but I do enjoy fantasy movies and video games.
That's great! What are some of your favorite fantasy movies?
I really enjoyed the Lord of the Rings movies and the Harry Potter movies.
Those are both great movies! I'm a big fan of the Lord of the Rings movies.
Me too! They're so well-made.
I'm glad you enjoyed them! What are some of your favorite video games?
I really enjoy the Zelda games and the Final Fantasy games.
I've played a few Zelda games, but I haven't played any Final Fantasy games.
You should definitely try them out! They're both great series.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
